Rahasia Umur Panjang Mahathir Mohamad
05 Nov 2019, 13:42 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Saat menghadiri pertemuan 35th Asean Summit Mahathir Mohamad berbagi rahasia umur panjangnya. (AFP PHOTO / POOL / HOW HWEE YOUNG)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Meski sudah berusia 94 tahun, Mahathir Mohamad masih menjabat dan menjalankan tugasnya sebagai Perdana Menteri Malaysia. Dia bahkan tercatat menjadi pemimpin negara tertua di dunia yang masih menjabat saat ini. Namun sepanjang sejarah, dia masih dikalahkan oleh Giovanni Paolo Lascaris yang melayani Malta sebagai Grand Master of the Knights Hospitaller sampai usia 97 tahun, 47 hari. Di usia senjanya, Mahathir masih terlihat kuat. Dia juga tengah menghadiri pertemuan 35th Asean Summit. Saat acara tersebut, moderator Arin Jira yang juga menjabat sebagai pemimpin Asean Business Advisory Council Thailand menanyakan rahasia umur panjang Mahathir Mohamad. Perdana Menteri Malaysia tersebut mengungkapkan bahwa dia sendiri tidak tahu bagaimana dia bisa bertahan lama dan berusia panjang. Namun dia mengaku beruntung karena tak menderita penyakit mematikan. Mengutip Asia One, dia bersikeras bahwa tak ada rahasia dari usia panjangnya. Hanya saja ada dia tetap harus disiplin menjaga kebiasaan makannya. "Jangan makan makanan berlemak, terlalu banyak karbohidrat dan gula. Anda harus tetap aktif, olahraga, latih tubuh dan otot agar tetap digunakan atau mereka akan jadi lemah," katanya. "Aktif berarti menggunakan seluruh sistem tubuh dan memakai otak untuk bicara, berdebat, berargumen, semua ini akan mengaktifkan otak sehingga berfungsi dengan baik.""Jika tidak terutama setelah Anda pensiun, lebih sering tidur dan istirahat, otak dan tubuh akan kehilangan kemampuan mereka dan organ memburuk." (chs)

Secrets of Longevity Mahathir Mohamad
05 Nov 2019, 13:42 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


While attending the 35th Asean Summit meeting Mahathir Mohamad shared the secrets of his longevity. (AFP PHOTO / POOL / HOW HWEE YOUNG)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Despite being 94 years old, Mahathir Mohamad is still serving and carrying out his duties as Prime Minister of Malaysia. He was even noted to be the leader of the oldest country in the world who is still in office today. But throughout history, he was still defeated by Giovanni Paolo Lascaris who served Malta as Grand Master of the Knights Hospitaller until the age of 97 years, 47 days. In his old age, Mahathir still looked strong. He is also attending the 35th Asean Summit meeting. During the event, moderator Arin Jira who also served as leader of the Asean Business Advisory Council in Thailand asked about the secrets of Mahathir Mohamad's longevity. The Malaysian Prime Minister revealed that he himself did not know how he could last long and live long. But he claimed to be lucky because he did not suffer from a deadly disease. Quoting Asia One, he insisted that there was no secret from his longevity. It's just that he still has to be disciplined in maintaining his eating habits. "Don't eat fatty foods, too much carbohydrate and sugar. You have to stay active, exercise, train your body and muscles to keep them used or they will become weak," he said. "Active means using the entire body system and using the brain to talk, argue, argue, all of these will activate the brain so that it functions properly." "If not especially after you retire, sleep more often and rest, the brain and body will lose their ability and organs deteriorate. " (chs)
